name: The Deer Is Watching: DEMO
description:
What is it?

A surrealistic thriller-comedy game, where you play as a man, who was trapped by a deer.

Gameplay

Find out what secrets this place has and also find the way out.

You have a strange new "friend" who will help you.

Core features
  • Surrealistic story
  • A deer
  • creepy atmosphere
  • no silly jumpscares
DEMO

The game is currently early DEMO, where you have only Chapter 1. This DEMO may have some bugs and glitches, so, yeah.

Controls
  • W, A, S, D - movement
  • Mouse - look around
  • LMB - use current object
  • RMB - drop current object
  • E - interact
  • Mouse wheel - zoom / unzoom
Developer

Game by Serious Daniel (Daniel Oschepkov)

Made with Unreal Engine.

Some models are taken from sketchfab, some sounds are used from zvukipro.com
